pkgmetadata.longdescription: Configural Frequencies Analysis Using Log-Linear Modeling // Offers several functions for Configural Frequencies Analysis (CFA), which is a useful statistical tool for the analysis of multiway contingency tables. CFA was introduced by G. A. Lienert as 'Konfigurations Frequenz Analyse - KFA'. Lienert, G. A. (1971). Die Konfigurationsfrequenzanalyse: I. Ein neuer Weg zu Typen und Syndromen. Zeitschrift fr Klinische Psychologie und Psychotherapie, 19(2), 99115.
